abstract: Oracle announced it has bought a 10.2 percent stake in Mellanox on the open market, but said it has no plans to make an unsolicited offer to take over the Israeli firm, Reuters reported.
snippet: Oracle announced it has bought a 10.2 percent stake in Mellanox on the open market, but said it has no plans to make an unsolicited offer to take over the Israeli firm, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Oracle has acquired a 10.2 percent stake in Mellanox Technologies of Israel on the open market, but Oracle said on Thursday that it had no plans to make an unsolicited offer to take over the company, Reuters reported.
